{
    var genres = storeDB.Genres.ToList();

 }

When I try to run the app, i get the following unhandled exception, can't figure out what's causing it:

A route named 'Default' is already in the route collection. Route names must be unique.
Parameter name: name

Line 23:             routes.IgnoreRoute("{resource}.axd/{*pathInfo}");
Line 24: 
Line 25:             routes.MapRoute(
Line 26:                 "Default", // Route name

Apologies for the state of the above posting!

j'ai exactement le même problème. La configuration du serveur peut elle jouer dans ce cas? (Débutant)

I Have the same problem. server configuration can have  role in this case ? (rookie)

The problem (for me) was caused by calling RegisterRoutes twice in Application_Start in Global.asax.cs.

I typed the code, as it appeared on the tutorial, into Application_Start - without realising that RegisterRoutes was already in there.

Simply remove one of the RegsiterRoutes. It resolved the issue for me.
